website_summaries.verdict: The rugged Nikon Coolpix S30 is a simple, inexpensive point-and-shoot to keep poolside, and doesn't try to be anything more.
pros: With big buttons, an easy-to-understand interface, and limited shooting options, the Nikon Coolpix S30 is a family-friendly waterproof and shockproof point-and-shoot
cons: The S30 is not a camera you want to use indoors or in low-light conditions

customer_reviews.title: It's "meh"
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this a so-so camera. I like the fact that it's a digital water camera, however, the pictures are not any better than a waterproof disposable camera. It doesn't matter how new the batteries, clarity is always an issue. If the camera or the focal point is moving in the slightest, the picture will be blurry. I have used this camera snorkeling and the pictures were alright. The water was unbelievably clear and the lightening was wonderful so I expected more from the photos. I have also used it at water parks and some of the pictures are clear enough to use. If I could do it over again., I would invest in a different camera.
customer_reviews.author: D in OK

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a GoPro!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace the same model that I lost on a cross country trip. Besides normal camera use, I mount it on my motorcycle to record special rides. It may not have the resolution of the newest GoPros, but it is as good as I will ever need. It held up very well in the rain. The only problem I experienced was loss of battery power in near freezing temps. Not the camera's fault. New, warm batteries worked just fine. As soon as the batteries warmed up, they were good to go again.
customer_reviews.author: Grimjaw

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I tried the camera the first time in water, and it just would not start. Water was on the inside of the camera and you could see the and moving inside. I was so excited too, I was in the Bahamas snorkeling then my day just dimmed down when I could not capture the great moments end my family had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a 'Feel Good' Point-and-Shoot Camera
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon CoolPix S30 point-and-shot Camera plus a 512MB SD-Card gives 100 full quality HD Pictures and is used for simple 'snap-shots'. The 'right' Combo for a Senior Citizen; feels good in the hand; and easy to hold-up to the face and simply snap-a-shot {fun to use}. This Combo replaces 3+ of those 27 Picture Film Disposable Flash Cameras. Plus allows for : at home picture editing, online print ordering, and web photo sharing.
customer_reviews.author: R H F

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Camera! My granddaughter 4 years old loves her Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old granddaughter can take great pictures and operates it like she has been doing forever. The hot pink is really vibrant colors. The menu is easy to navigate. This camera takes great pictures. Haven't dropped it yet, but according to Nikon you should be able to drop it 3 feet and not hurt it. The flash in the middle is also great because little fingers dont block it. I would definetly recommend it. For the price its a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera Had Issues
customer_reviews.text: Seller was great with refunding but the camera was having issues. It would shut off while taking pictures sometimes and every time you had to change the batteries it would loose the date and time.
customer_reviews.author: Synergi Techs Inc

customer_reviews.title: Good first camera for kids
customer_reviews.text: You don't buy this camera because it takes good pictures. You buy it as a first camera for your kid. It is more shock proof than most, it is water proof down to 10 feet. It also won't set you back an arm and a leg so when it finally gives up you will hopefully feel like your kid learned how to handle a camera and can move on to better things. It takes photos, videos, allows some creative touches that are fun for kids and while the quality isn't always the best it will give your kid a good first experience with cameras.
customer_reviews.author: KveldÚlfur

customer_reviews.title: Works underwater, not many features
customer_reviews.text: We tested this right out of the box and the camera is indeed water proof! Only 10 ft I believe it said on the box, but that's enough for me, just don't want to ruin it when we go on cruises. The one thing that bothered me is it doesn't have an option to have the flash on by default. It's either auto or off. Otherwise, for as cheap as it was, it works for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad camera
customer_reviews.text: It worked wonderfully for us... during the day time. The flash is not something you can control. It's either on & auto or turned off. It would go off at random times, but we could not get it to go off in the dead of the night, so we returned it. If you think you'll never take nighttime pictures, it's a perfect camera with tons of fun settings. But unless ours was a malfunction, it's not going to take pictures at night that require a flash.
customer_reviews.author: Breianna Hanson

customer_reviews.title: ok a little bulky but seems weather resistant
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I have troubles w the shutter release but it has served as a sufficient outdoor pocket camera. I've even taken a few underwater pics with it. Seems to eat batteries fairly quickly and adjustments are limited. I'd try a thinner other brand starting w P next. It has proven fairly durable in the year + I have had it.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie W. Dunaway

customer_reviews.title: Video not very reliablle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little camera. The menues are a bit confusing at first, not very "Nikon" in design. The video does not run for reliable times or repeatable times, it just stops without notice. Overall an excellent little ruggedized snap shooter. Don't buy it for video though.
customer_reviews.author: Bill P

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift. Stopped working after the second picture taken
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Foote

customer_reviews.title: Worked good for awhile but these digital cameras sure don't last ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked good for awhile but these digital cameras sure don't last like the old Kodak Brownie. I think I'm living in the wrong century !
customer_reviews.author: Michigan resident

customer_reviews.title: Ok Camera
customer_reviews.text: It will serve its purpose of protecting my everyday camera and phone from being dropped in the water. Photo quality hit and miss. Great on some but if the sun is too bright it is really washed out looking.. I love Nikon and this is the first product I haven't loved
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: only if it had rechargeable batteries....
customer_reviews.text: I would have rated a 4 star, but I need to put batteries in it. It is also somewhat large and sort-of feels cheap. Very plastic(ie). This will be used by my daughter. After a month of use - I will update this review if I need to downgrade review.
customer_reviews.author: MCB31904

customer_reviews.title: Lovely camera
customer_reviews.text: It's been in plenty of water, not too deep though, and it looks beautiful when I take videos in the water. The only problem is the sand granules got stuck where I try to shut the battery lid so it makes it more difficult to shut it, but it still works.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing camera in a beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I bought it for my niece and she absolutely loved it!!!! The color is beautiful. The blue is just so captivating... The only thing was that it didn't come with a memory card, you have to buy one separately but thats ok for the excited look on her face. It was well worth it. The camera also came very quick. It was delivered within a week of ordering it. THANK YOU guys so much!
customer_reviews.author: Nora Reguig

customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughter for Christmas. It has been perfect for her and she has really enjoyed using it. It was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Anita Gibbon

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: HOWEVER, I don't recall the ad for it stating that it doesn't have an internal memory that will hold more than 7 pictures. I have ordered an 8 Gb SSD card for it though.
customer_reviews.author: HR BRACK

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband to take fishing on his boat. He hasn't dropped it in the water yet, so not sure about the water feature, but the camera takes good pictures.
customer_reviews.author: CarylAine

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price. It's mp aren't that high and the photos aren't crust clear but it did the job and our photos turned out pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: ZAHRA A

customer_reviews.title: Nikon
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, it was great underwater and clear. Also took a bunch of pics of different things and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Rickman

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color but good customer support
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered PINK but received BLACK instead. Camera itself works perfectly and good/prompt customer support.
customer_reviews.author: kamo1126

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Choice for a low cost underwater Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera for my 13 yr. old grandson. His Sony was ruined when he went on a water ride at Six Flaggs, so I decided he needed a waterproof camera. We were both delighted to learn this camera is designed to take photos and video for a least 7 ft. underwater. He went river rafting at Tahoe and he had so much fun with taking photos/videos underwater. It is also shatterproof. Quality of pictures is excellent. I would highly recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: C. T. KUNDE

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can do Video and still shots. My dogs have been my main focus, can't wait to venture out and really have fun.. My reason for this camera was to document things because our adult children are in different states. I would say if your looking for a good sturdy camera this is it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera.......always had good luck with Nikon and it was a gift so I was hoping the person would like it and use it and it is good.
customer_reviews.author: tebo3shes

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Purchases this camara for my son to take on a beach vacation. The first day he took it in the water snorkeling, the camara shut off within 10 minutes. The lens fogged up and it the sd card was damp. He had taken a few pictures on land that came out OK. We had taken extra precautions in installing the batteries and making sure it was closed properly after reading other reviews of this camara. It is easy to use, but worthless for underwater shots. Replaced it with the Pentax and it works great. Don't waste your money on this camara if you intend to use it for underwater photos.
customer_reviews.author: bdladd

customer_reviews.title: very good camera
customer_reviews.text: takes great easy pictures under and above water. only problem was that it needs a brighter flash, the pictures are washed out and dull if it's just a few feet under the surface and subject is five or six feet away
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grossfeld

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I got this camera for christmas because I went paddle boarding and kayaking and i needed it to take pictures on the water. it took amazing pictures and when i fell into the water it still worked fine. the picture quality is outstanding under and out of the water. perfect for capturing all of the moments in the ocean and pool
customer_reviews.author: hydeehoe

customer_reviews.title: Not good for Pictures
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these camera's for my 5 and 8 year olds, they asked for a camera that takes underwater photo's. We haven't tried the underwater portion of the camera; however, for normal picture taking this is not a good camera, the clearity of the pictures are very subpar. Technology in cameras to date should be able to produce good pictures regaurdless of the ability to take photo's underwater. I would not recommend buying this camera.
customer_reviews.author: M. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix S30
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this camera. We have a lot of trouble with it. Worked Okay for a few weeeks then it stoped saving the Pic's. Changed SD card and no change. Called Nikon and not much help. This is the only Nikon I have ever had trouble with. I own 4 others model's and they all work great..
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rolfe

customer_reviews.title: Good camera for water sports
customer_reviews.text: The camera worked well for taking pictures while on a week long canoe trip. The pictures were clear and sharp. I did not have to worry about getting the camera wet. I just to make sure i kept the camera in a ziplock back while on the water, just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Really good camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for a vacation, you can take it with you on all the rides, it can get wet, it can take a beating, and it takes great pictures and mini movies. I would not take this under water, but the ocasional splash from a ride was fine, and did not effect the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica H.

customer_reviews.title: Not very drop-proof as touted.
customer_reviews.text: Menus are hard to follow. Owner's manual is very vauge and does not cover all the features. Worst, it is rated as shock-proof for a drop from 2.5 feet, but mine broke from a drop of about two feet. The lens is now inoperable and I only had it for two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: g. patrick hunter III

customer_reviews.title: Takes great pictures
customer_reviews.text: this is a great camera, took awesome pictures on land and under sea. it really is point and shoot beautiful pictures. the only negative is that the compartment that holds the battery and photo card is very difficult to open (probably in order to keep it waterproof.)
customer_reviews.author: Beth Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not Great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the camera and was happy at first and then about two months into using it the side buttons stopped working. Also the part that covers up the memory card and batteries is extremely hard to open. It takes good quality photos but not good enough for me to want another coolpix s30. Again I would not suggest getting this camera. However despite the many problems it was a good first camera and perfect for a snorkeling vacation. It was easy to use and convenient because it runs on AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: Good Photos and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy little camera, good to depths that would be reached while snorkeling. The strobe brings out the natural colors of the subjects, and it is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Not Provided

customer_reviews.title: Pictures are grainy. Color is off. Shutter time ...
customer_reviews.text: Pictures are grainy. Color is off. Shutter time is slow.
customer_reviews.author: Malcantar81

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because its waterproof. It is a bit larger than the S200 that it replaced. So far I have been happy with the picture quality.It is an easy to use point and shoot camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lance L Mumford

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix cameras
customer_reviews.text: These cameras are of average quality but easy to use - these cameras are used in the workplace and are fairly reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: broke after 1 month. Nikon makes you pay to ...
customer_reviews.text: broke after 1 month.Nikon makes you pay to ship it to a repair facility to evaluate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for an 11 year old girl (pink right). She is totally thrilled. Takes great pictures and had a great price.
customer_reviews.author: glen green

customer_reviews.title: coolpix
customer_reviews.text: This camera worked great in the water and out. The pictures were only grainy when zoomed in all the way, but overall the pictures were good. This camera was perfect for snorkeling and boating. I got great underwater shots. Extremely easy to use as well. For a 7 day trip I only changed the batteries twice. It took a beating on some rocks without breaking. Most important of all it did not leak water into it and break like most of the other cameras available.
customer_reviews.author: V. M.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my niece. She was so excited until she took it on vacation and it is suppose to be able to go under water, well it died as soon as she went under water. Very disappointed. And i have gotten knowwhere with the warranty to replace :(
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to do home inspections. I thought it would be perfect. The problem I had is using the camera in low light to dark conditions like in a crawl space. The problem I had was the camera would not always flash. I sent it back to Nikon service twice and they said there was no problem. They said to set the camera at a close up setting and that would work. It didn't. The camera has no setting to have it always flash. It might be good for kids , but I think they have some bugs to correct.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery, this Nikon does what it's called for. Recommended! it's great for the price. You can actually record video under water (in pools better).
customer_reviews.author: Joe Brook

customer_reviews.title: broke now our of warranty
customer_reviews.text: it broke. i can view pictures but cant take any. just black screen in either camera mode like im in the dark. the screen still works as all the settings menu's are accessible still as well. now amazon says it's out of warranty
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for kids
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera for our 5 year old son and he loves it. He has been able to shoot pretty good pictures and films because it's very simple and intuitive to use, and it's robust enough to go anywhere including underwater without any fear for scratch. After 2 months of use we're very happy with our choice.
customer_reviews.author: jacques

customer_reviews.title: Should have read the fine print.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these cameras for my granddaughters for Christmas. I didn't realize they were not rechargeable and require 2 AA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Iris Marie

customer_reviews.title: Crap
customer_reviews.text: Batteries lasted about 2 pictures before it died. Same with any other brand new pair of batteries, this camera just sucks the life out of them. Flash only works when you aren't swimming. This is shameful, Nikon. The video quality is total poppycock. The picture-edit software on the CD? Doesn't even work. Returning the camera as soon as I can.
customer_reviews.author: foxygrandpa69

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: The image quality is really bad, and it's even worst when you take underwater pictures. It's a piece of rubbish.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S30
customer_reviews.text: Bought the camera for my daughter which is six years old and she loves it as well as I. Very easy and fun to use. I highly recommend it especially for youngsters
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my 5-year old daughter.
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year old daughter dropped it while taking a picture. My daughter is about 3 feet tall. So she probably dropped it 2 and a half feet and the sensor is somehow dislodged. The screen lets you replay pictures and shows some black fuzziness when trying to take a new picture, but is no longer functional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daddy broke it
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how I managed to break this camera but I dropped it about 3 feet and the sacrificial lens cracked. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: CecilSaxon

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is crappy at best. It would probably make a nice gift for a first time camera user/child. But if you're expecting to buy this and take good photos, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this camera with her birthday money she used it twice in our swimming pool and it stopped working DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: CHOP1977

customer_reviews.title: Almost Couldnt Get Pictures Out!!
customer_reviews.text: The actual photos were great quality, impressive actually... but after going to Aruba on honeymoon, we came home and found that the camera's SD/battery door was SEALED shut. Took me 2 hours and one blistered thumb to open it. I luckily got my SD drive out undamaged, closed it thinking that I fixed the issue... and haven't been able to open it since! I'm returning it once I figure out how to return items on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: honeymooner

product_meta.title: Nikon COOLPIX S30 10.1 MP Digital Camera with 3x Zoom Nikkor Glass Lens and 2.7-inch LCD (Pink)
product_meta.description:
Color:PinkFROM THE MANUFACTURER






Families now have a camera to take wherever they go. Waterproof and shockproof, the COOLPIX S30 is ideal for everything from poolside fun to playground action. A 10.1 MP sensor produces top quality images, ideal for printing and sharing. The 3x wide-angle lens frames clear memories of all the important people and moments in your life.




READY FOR ACTION
WATERPROOF, SHOCKPROOF
Drop it, toss it, throw it in the pool. The S30 survives and lives to take the photo! Go underwater to create photos and movies at depths down to 9.8 feet (3 meters). It's also shockproof to withstand drops of up to about 2.6 feet.





SUPER SIMPLE TO USE
EASIER THAN RIDING A BIKE!
Get super simple camera operation with the S30. You'll love the oversized buttons designed to make it easy to create photos and movies. And an easy-to-understand menu makes photography a breeze.





FUN FOR ALL
CREATIVE TOUCHES THAT INSPIRE
Have fun personalizing the photos you take. There are a number of creative options such as Selective Color that will inspire your creativity. The best part, immediately see how the chosen effect alters an image! View it all on the large and sharp 2.7-inch LCD monitor.







MOVIE MAKING MADE EASY
HD (720P) MOVIES WITH SOUND
A simple press of the movie record button and cue the action. You will love playing director and recording the action! Touch a button and start recording. Memorable moments are saved in HD (720p). Show the family what you just filmed by viewing on the 2.7-inch LCD monitor, or save for later and gather around to watch on an HDTV or computer. Best yet, upload to the Web to share.





SHARE THE MAGIC
IN-CAMERA SLIDESHOWS WITH MUSIC
Instantly review and laugh over the pictures and movies of the day with the easy slideshow mode. Select playback effects and built-in music to accompany your show—fun to share with friends and family. Connects easily to an HDTV via the HDMI port. Share the sights and sounds of your adventure.








PORTRAITS MADE EASY!
When your subject smiles the camera automatically takes the shot...easy!





IMAGES ARE SHARP AND CLEAR
Electronic VR Image Stabilization minimizes the effects of camera shake for sharper, clearer images.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.2 out of 5 stars84 ratings3.2 out of 5 stars
